question: Do I get a course completion certificate ?
answer: Everyone will get a course completion certificate that you can scan and verify from our website. You can download the soft copy of the certificate online and the printed copy will be delivered to your address.

question: Do I get the lifetime access of the courses ?
answer: Those who buy the course once, they will get lifetime access to all the content of this course and will continue to get all future updates. Apart from this, you will also have lifelong access to private groups where we will try to answer questions.

question: What are the reward after completing the courses
answer: Those who will do well in the course, 3 people will be given the opportunity of paid internship in our company by selecting verification. At the same time, you will get the opportunity to work directly with Nahian Nahin, founder of Learn with Nahin.

question: Will I get a job recommendation letter
answer: We will write job recommendation letter by selecting those who will do good results in various quizzes, assignments and examinations of the course and get at least 70% marks overall. This course cannot guarantee a job to anyone because no course can do that. However, the right guidelines for hardworking and dedicated learners will definitely ensure and help them to do well with confidence in the job interview.
